title: Living tomorrow. No. 153
creator_credit: British Information Services and London Television Service
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: Cross fertilization: a concept that’s blossomed in one field will often take root in another - a form of cross fertilisation which makes the most of a good idea; driverless bus; germ free chickens; points on posts; horse sensor.
